attributes.action: Motorhome overnight parking provision for access to central London.
attributes.additional_details: Overnight parking for motorhomes is essential in tourist areas. The activity is on the increase so the loss of Crystal Palace caravan club site later this year will make the London city area more inaccessible to a large number of people.
attributes.background: Motorhome parking is being hit again later this year with the loss of crystal palace caravan club site. The site is used by many UK and overseas tourists each year boosting London tourism revenue.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. Parking is the responsibility of the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
